channel.title: Resources on MLWhiz
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on MLWhiz

item.title: Top Data Science Resources on the Internet right now
item.description: I have been looking to create this list for a while now. There are many people on quora who ask me how I started in the data science field. And so I wanted to create this reference. To be frank, when I first started learning it all looked very utopian and out of the world. The Andrew Ng course felt like black magic. And it still doesn’t cease to amaze me.
